mapper.select: SELECT REVIEW_ID ,TRAVEL_ID ,MEMBER_ID ,R_CONTENT ,R_SCORE ,CREATE_DATE ,MODIFIED_DATE FROM TRA_REV WHERE TRAVEL_ID = #{TRAVEL_ID}
mapper.insert: insert into TRA_REV (REVIEW_ID , TRAVEL_ID ,MEMBER_ID ,R_CONTENT ,R_SCORE ,CREATE_DATE ,MODIFIED_DATE ) values (REVIEW_ID_SEQ.nextval,#{travel_id} ,#{member_id}, #{r_content}, #{r_score} ,sysdate, sysdate )
